snippet: For Andy Murray, reaching Sunday's French Open final was a bonus, but he was in no mood to look for silver linings in the aftermath of yet another grand slam reverse at the hands of Novak Djokovic....
lead_paragraph: For Andy Murray, reaching Sunday's French Open final was a bonus, but he was in no mood to look for silver linings in the aftermath of yet another grand slam reverse at the hands of Novak Djokovic.

headline.print_headline: Murray Tastes Bittersweet Loss in 'Unexpected' French Open Final
headline.main: Murray Tastes Bittersweet Loss in 'Unexpected' French Open Final
